translation.en: The Flounders.
translation.ja: ヒラメチーム ヒラメチーム

translation.en: A ragtag team of rejects from the Valley...
translation.ja: バリー出身の寄せ集めチーム

translation.en: assembled for one reason
translation.ja: ある目的の下 集まった

translation.en: and one reason only.
- To fail. -
- - But they didn't fail.
They didn't exactly succeed, - but they didn't fail. -
translation.ja: 成功はしなかったが 失敗してない

translation.en: Thanks to a technicality,
they passed the Junior Rescue Training.
translation.ja: ジュニア･レスキューの 試験に合格

translation.en: Now, they'll be protecting the beaches of Malibu from Tower Two.
translation.ja: タワー２からマリブビーチの 安全を守る

translation.en: - - Tyler, the wise guy
translation.ja: タイラー さわやかな髪の賢い男 さわやかな髪の賢い男 タイラー

translation.en: with the great hair.
translation.ja: さわやかな髪の賢い男 タイラー

translation.en: - Gina... -
...the tough one.
translation.ja: 強い女 ジーナ ジーナ

translation.en: Lizzie. Spunky, with a dark side.
translation.ja: リジー リジー ダークサイドの勇者

translation.en: Dylan, the captain with a lot to prove.
translation.ja: ディラン 今後が期待されるリーダー 今後が期待されるリーダー ディラン

translation.en: Eric, the heart of the group.
translation.ja: エリック チームの癒し系 エリック

translation.en: And... Tyler--
translation.ja: そしてタイラー そしてタイラー タイラー

translation.en: - Hold on. -
translation.ja: タイラー タイラー 待って

translation.en: - You already said Tyler. - I did?
You started with him. It's way too much Tyler.
I think it's exactly the right amount of me.
Of course you do.
Spunky with a dark side? I don't see it.
Oh! Did I tell you? My dad was mowing the lawn in his bare feet and he cut off three toes.
translation.ja: パパが芝刈りしてて 足の指を３本切った

translation.en: I asked the doctor if I could sew one on and he said maybe next time.
translation.ja: 医者に縫わせてと 頼んだら今度と

translation.en: I really hope there's a next time!
Oh. Spunky with a dark side.
I hear it now.
Yo, Eric, I can't believe you made this. Where'd you get the footage?
translation.ja: よく作ったな　映像は？

translation.en: Vooch shot it.
I also do weddings and bar mitzvahs.
translation.ja: 結婚式と ユダヤの成人式もやる

translation.en: Guys, squeeze in.
I wanna get a pic of your first day as official Malibu Junior Rescue.
translation.ja: レスキュー初日の 記念写真を撮る

translation.en: Everybody say, Who's driving?
Who's driving?
Wait, who is driving?
Where are they?
Please, please, please, don't be late on our first day!
Oh, hey, Dylan! Where's your team?
translation.ja: ディラン 君のチームは？

translation.en: You know... I thought I smelled Valley trash earlier,
translation.ja: あのな バレー臭(くさ)いと思ったら ゴミ箱があった

translation.en: but it turns out I was just walking by the dumpster.
translation.ja: バレー臭(くさ)いと思ったら ゴミ箱があった

translation.en: That's funny!
You know, they're on their way. Be here any second.
translation.ja: みんな もうすぐ来るわ

translation.en: Boop- boop! Oh, just got a text.
translation.ja: ブブ　メールが来た

translation.en: - They're right around the corner. - Did you just say, boop- boop?
No, that's the sound my phone makes when I get a text.
translation.ja: メールが来た合図なの

translation.en: Oh, hang on, I gotta respond.
- Click, click, click, click, click... - Your phone is wack.
translation.ja: カチ カチ… 変な電話

translation.en: Just admit it, Dylan. You can't handle being a captain.
Garvin should have never given you a tower.
Hey, guys! Ready to save some lives?
Oh! Can you say it again? Eric's head was in the way.
translation.ja: もう１度 エリックの頭が入った

translation.en: Vooch has been filming us for weeks without our knowledge.
translation.ja: ヴーチは内緒で撮影してる

translation.en: Oh, that's... troubling.
All right, all right, I'm coming. I'll be right there.
translation.ja: 分かった　すぐ行く

translation.en: I'm so proud of you guys. Aw! Kill it today, okay?
translation.ja: 誇りに思うぞ やっつけろ

translation.en: No, wait!
Save it.
You guys, you're here! You're officially Malibu Junior Rescue!
translation.ja: 今日からマリブ･ ジュニア･レスキューよ

translation.en: - Yeah! - Yeah! Now what?
Malibu Beach.
Twenty- seven miles of the most beautiful coast in the world,
translation.ja: 43キロに及ぶ 世界有数の美しい海岸

translation.en: and it's our job to protect all of it.
translation.ja: 私たちがすべてを守る

translation.en: From the beach, from the water, from the air...
translation.ja: ビーチも 海水も 大気も

translation.en: Not space. That's not really our jurisdiction.
All right!
Welcome to the first day of Malibu Beach Junior Rescue! Come on!
translation.ja: マリブビーチ･ジュニア･ レスキューにようこそ

translation.en: Now listen.
Our job is about more than just hangin' out at our towers and lookin' pretty.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)たちの仕事は おしゃれに見せる事ではない

translation.en: But some of us can't help it. Am I right, Tower One?
- Come on. -
Junior Rescue also gets assignments each morning,
translation.ja: 毎朝 任務(にんむ)を与(あた)えられる

translation.en: and I'm the one in charge of handing them out.
translation.ja: 俺が任務を割(わ)り振(ふ)る

translation.en: Most are dope. Some are super lame. But they all gotta get done.
translation.ja: いい任務もあるが 最悪(さいあく)の物もある

translation.en: So get pumped, Tower One, because I gave us ATV Patrol.
translation.ja: タワー１ バギーパトロールだ

translation.en: - Come on! -
Everybody else... check the board. Let's go!
translation.ja: 他のチームは ボードで確認(かくにん) 行くぞ！

translation.en: I wonder what assignment we got!
This is an official Junior Rescue assignment?
translation.ja: これがジュニア･ レスキューの任務？

translation.en: I thought we were gonna rescue swimmers, scan for sharks, run in slow motion.
translation.ja: 人助けやスローで走ったり するはずだろ

translation.en: - You know, cool stuff. - And we will.
translation.ja: 人助けやスローで走ったり するはずだろ やるわ

translation.en: Well, not run in slow motion. Nobody can do that.
translation.ja: スローで走るのはムリ

translation.en: But for right now, we have to focus on the assignment we got,
translation.ja: 今は任務に集中しよう

translation.en: and keeping the beach clean is important.
translation.ja: ビーチの掃除(そうじ)は大事よ

translation.en: I know it's not exciting or glamorous.
You guys, I just checked Instagram, and Jiffpom was here, like, five minutes ago!
translation.ja: インスタによると ５分前 ジフポンが来てた

translation.en: Any one of these piles could be his!
Is it just me, or are there a surprising amount of turds on this beach?
translation.ja: ビーチがウンチまみれで 驚(おどろ)いてるのは私だけ？

translation.en: Come on.
Didn't want you guys to get bored, so I restocked the beach for you, losers.
translation.ja: 退屈(たいくつ)させないために 調達してきた

translation.en: He borrowed three dogs just to mess with us, and we're losers.
translation.ja: 嫌(いや)がらせのために ３匹犬を借(か)りたの？

translation.en: Yes, I did.
- I'm gonna handle this. - Tyler, stop.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)に任せて やめて

translation.en: Okay? it's not worth it. Just ignore him.
translation.ja: おこる価(か)値(ち)ない　ムシして

translation.en: Oh, hey, uh, watch your step, 'cause Tiger here ate a block
translation.ja: 気をつけろよ タイガーは腹(はら)を下してる

translation.en: of cheddar earlier, and it is not agreeing with him.
translation.ja: タイガーは腹(はら)を下してる

translation.en: Oh, not one bit. All right, have fun.
translation.ja: 気にするなよ 楽しんで

translation.en: - That was some good poopin', you guys! -
Yes, it was.
I hate that guy.
translation.ja: アイツ 大嫌(だいきら)い

translation.en: Hand sanitizer for you, and you...
translation.ja: 〝マリブビーチ･ レスキュー本部〞 〝マリブビーチ･ レスキュー本部〞 消毒薬(しょうどくやく)をどうぞ　君も 消毒薬(しょうどくやく)をどうぞ　君も

translation.en: and you, and me.
Lizzie, you want in on this?
No, thanks, I'm good.
Usually I think my mom's crazy for packing things like this...
translation.ja: ママが余計(よけい)な物入れて イラつくけど

translation.en: but I'm lovin' it right now.
- Uh, Dylan, can you do my back? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 背中に塗(ぬ)って いいわ

translation.en: Well, thanks to Brody, now I have to burn these.
translation.ja: ブロディのせいで使えない

translation.en: - What's his problem? - He's just trying to get to us.
translation.ja: なぜだ？ 困(こま)らせたいの

translation.en: - Well, it's working. - Look, Dylan, you're our tower captain.
translation.ja: 効果(こうか)ありだ リーダーが何とかして

translation.en: - You have to do something. - I am.
translation.ja: リーダーが何とかして そうね

translation.en: I'm gonna take us back to our tower, and we're gonna forget all about Brody
translation.ja: ブロディは忘(わす)れて タワーに戻(もど)る

translation.en: and focus on saving lives.
translation.ja: 人命救助(きゅうじょ)よ

translation.en: Come on, guys, let's go.
There's my least favorite tower.
translation.ja: 気に食わないタワーだ

translation.en: - Got a couple more jobs for you guys. - But we already did all our assignments.
translation.ja: 頼(たの)みたい仕事がある 任務はすませた

translation.en: Yeah, I know, but a couple slipped through the cracks,
and it's up to me to make sure they get done...
translation.ja: やるべき仕事があった

translation.en: by you.
Buoy maintenance?
Swim fin disinfection?
It's almost like someone's giving us the worst jobs on purpose.
translation.ja: イヤな仕事を押(お)しつけてるな

translation.en: Yeah, it is, isn't it?
That's not fair.
But, it is hilarious.
What can I say?
When you guys humiliated us in front of the mayor, you started a war.
translation.ja: 市長の前で侮辱(ぶじょく)した時から 戦闘(せんとう)開始だ

translation.en: You're punishing us because we saved a life?
Doy! Uh... What did you think was gonna happen?
translation.ja: 当然(とうぜん)だ 予想(よそう)できるだろ

translation.en: I don't know, we'd be praised for our heroism and welcomed among you?
translation.ja: 仲間になれると思った

translation.en: Well, joke's on you, brah.
translation.ja: 冗談(じょうだん)じゃない

translation.en: You'll never be one of us.
We all agree we gotta take that guy down, right?
No, we all agree that no matter what Brody throws at us,
translation.ja: ブロディが何をしても

translation.en: we're gonna do such a great job that even he'll have to admit we belong here.
translation.ja: いい働(はたら)きをして認めさせる

translation.en: I can't believe I'm saying this right now, but... Dylan's right.
translation.ja: 認めたくないけど ディランが正しい

translation.en: We want people to respect us, we have to earn it.
translation.ja: 尊敬(そんけい)は勝ち取るもの

translation.en: Yes, exactly! Take the high road.
translation.ja: そうよ　正しい事をしよう

translation.en: Come on, team. Let's go scrape barnacles off the buoys.
translation.ja: みんなでブイを きれいにしよう

translation.en: Taking the high road sucks.
translation.ja: 正しい事ってサイテー

translation.en: We earned our spot here, and you're gonna let him ruin our summer?
translation.ja: 俺たちの夏が台なしになる

translation.en: Forget that. We gotta fight fire with fire.
What does that even mean?
It means we gotta prank Brody so hard that he'll never mess with us again.
translation.ja: ブロディに思い知らせてやる

translation.en: Tyler, everybody already thinks we don't deserve to be here!
translation.ja: 私たちは場違(ばちが)いだと 思われてる

translation.en: If we go after Brody instead of doing our job, it'll just prove them right.
translation.ja: そんな事したら それが正しいと証明(しょうめい)される

translation.en: I'm your captain, and I say we scrape buoys.
translation.ja: リーダーの言う事 聞いて

translation.en: And I will, as soon as I'm done shutting Brody up. Trust me.
translation.ja: 了解(りょうかい) ブロディをやっつけたら

translation.en: Tyler!
I can't believe him! Can you believe him?
Actually, I gotta go with Tyler on this one.
translation.ja: 私もタイラーに賛成(さんせい)

translation.en: I mean, it's classic first day of kindergarten.
translation.ja: 幼稚園(ようちえん)の初日と同じ

translation.en: Find the biggest kid on the yard... and take her to knuckle town.
translation.ja: 一番大きい子を… ぶちのめす

translation.en: Then everybody knows you're no one's punk.
translation.ja: 弱虫じゃないと示(しめ)す

translation.en: Sorry, Dylan!
This is crazy!
Pretty much.
Right, there's gotta be something in here I can use to prank Brody.
translation.ja: ブロディを こらしめる物があるはず

translation.en: Ooh, hello.
Speargun.
- This will totally shut him up. -
Uh, maybe something less permanent.
translation.ja: もう少しマイルドでもいい

translation.en: Tyler? Tyler, are you in here?
Over... here.
I wanna help get back at Brody.
Whoa!
Is it bad?
It's horrible.
Then why are you smiling?
'Cause I get to take 'em out.
No, no, no. No, no, no, no. I'm good.
translation.ja: やめてくれ　俺は平気

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good.
translation.ja: 大丈夫(だいじょうぶ)だから “マリブビーチ･ レスキュー本部”

translation.en: Hey. We went ahead and grouped the buoys into piles.
That's yours, that's Tyler's, that's Lizzie's.
translation.ja: リーダーの タイラーとリジーの

translation.en: - Where are those guys? - They promised me
translation.ja: どこなの？ 私が禁じた事をやったら すぐ来るって

translation.en: they'd be right back as soon as they finished doing the thing I told them not to do.
translation.ja: 私が禁じた事をやったら すぐ来るって

translation.en: So you just let them go?
No, I didn't let them. They just... didn't listen.
translation.ja: そうじゃない 話を聞かなかった

translation.en: Hey, that's not right. We're a team.
We can't accomplish anything unless we're together.
translation.ja: 一緒(いっしょ)にやらなきゃ

translation.en: - I'll go get them. - No, wait!
translation.ja: 捜(さが)してくる 待って

translation.en: Seriously?
We can't be a team if everyone keeps leaving.
- Why is nobody listening to me? - Don't beat yourself up.
translation.ja: なぜ誰(だれ)も聞かないの？ 尊敬(そんけい)されないのは あなたのせいじゃない

translation.en: It's not your fault the team doesn't respect you.
translation.ja: 尊敬(そんけい)されないのは あなたのせいじゃない

translation.en: What, you think the team doesn't respect me?
- You think they do? - I did.
Oh...
Well, they don't.
I ran out of bandages, so I had to get creative.
translation.ja: バンドエイドの代わり

translation.en: Thanks, Lizzie.
Uh, missed one.
Okay.
Let's just get the supplies to prank Brody.
Ooh, grab that rope.
I have an idea.
Somebody's coming. We're not supposed to be in here. Hide!
translation.ja: 誰か来た　隠(かく)れろ

translation.en: Hi, Eric.
They're alive?
I'm sorry about the mouth- to- mouth. I'd never done it before!
translation.ja: 人工呼吸の時は悪かった

translation.en: I didn't know you weren't supposed to use tongue!
translation.ja: 舌はダメだと知らなくて

translation.en: Eric... it's me.
I knew that.
You guys, Dylan, Gina, and I have been doing all the work.
translation.ja: 僕たちは仕事をしてる

translation.en: You gotta come help.
We are helping. We're getting Brody to back off.
translation.ja: ブロディへの仕返しも仕事よ

translation.en: But Dylan said--
Dylan wants us to do this.
Then why did she tell you not to?
Think about it. She's the captain. She can't tell us to break the rules.
translation.ja: リーダーだから ルールを破(やぶ)れない

translation.en: But she doesn't like Brody any more than we do.
translation.ja: 彼女もブロディが嫌い

translation.en: - I don't know... - Well, I do!
translation.ja: そうかな 嫌ってる

translation.en: - Tyler? Where are you? - Let's just say
I didn't jump into a bin full of fish hooks...
translation.ja: つり針(ばり)だらけの中に 飛び込(こ)んでない

translation.en: ...and I definitely didn't do it twice.
translation.ja: つり針(ばり)だらけの中に 飛び込(こ)んでない しかも２度は

translation.en: Yes, he did.
Then, how am I supposed to get everyone to respect me as the captain?
translation.ja: リーダーとして 尊敬(そんけい)されるには？

translation.en: First, stop asking questions like that. Captains don't ask.
translation.ja: 質問(しつもん)はやめる リーダーは質問しない

translation.en: Okay, let's say you were captain. How would you--
translation.ja: あなたがリーダーなら どう…

translation.en: You're asking again.
When was the last time anybody cleaned these things?
translation.ja: 前に掃除(そうじ)したのはいつ？

translation.en: Half my team has bailed on me, Brody thinks I'm a joke...
translation.ja: チームはバラバラ ブロディは見下すし

translation.en: Maybe I'm not cut out for this.
Gross.
You're right. Doubting yourself is gross!
translation.ja: 自信がないのってキモイ

translation.en: But how can I not?
I mean, I've been here three summers. I know Junior Rescue inside and out.
translation.ja: ３年もいて レスキューの事は熟知(じゅくち)してる

translation.en: I even made captain. Everyone still walks all over me.
translation.ja: リーダーにもなれたのに

translation.en: You better figure it out fast, 'cause we're the only ones working,
and these fins are disgusting.
- - Ew! What is that? Eel barf?
- - Something in here just moved!
What is that?
Wait. Those look like tentacles.
translation.ja: 触角(しょっかく)みたい

translation.en: - - Is that what I think it is?
- Whoa. -
You guys know you got stuff all over your face, right?
That's it! I'm not doing this all summer! I'm taking him down.
translation.ja: もう我慢(がまん)できない やっつける

translation.en: Gina, wait!
When Brody comes back to Tower One, he'll step into this net.
translation.ja: この網(あみ)に足を入れると

translation.en: Which is attached to that parasail.
All of which is attached to that Polaris.
translation.ja: あの車とつながってる

translation.en: I'll drive off, dragging Brody across Dog Beach,
translation.ja: 犬のビーチをひきずる

translation.en: the parasail will open, lifting him into the air and out over the ocean.
translation.ja: すると パラセールが開いて 空中へ

translation.en: Then we'll release the rope, and kersploosh!
translation.ja: 縄(なわ)をほどいて ザブン！

translation.en: You can say kersploosh, kersplat, kersplunk. It's still a ker- felony!
translation.ja: 〝ザブン ピシャ ドサッ〞は犯罪(はんざい)だ

translation.en: This is crazy!
Is it crazy or is it crazy?
I'm not hearing the difference.
- Eric, we're doing this for the team. - What team?
translation.ja: チームのためだ どの？

translation.en: Ever since you decided to prank Brody, we haven't been a team.
translation.ja: 仕返しを決めてから チームじゃない

translation.en: Somebody had to do something. Dylan didn't have a plan.
translation.ja: ディランに計画はない

translation.en: Yes, she did. You just didn't give it a chance.
translation.ja: あった でも話を聞かず―

translation.en: You ignored her.
I didn't mean to.
Well, you did.
It's our first day, and we're already falling apart.
Don't you get it?
This is exactly what Brody wants.
translation.ja: ブロディの望(のぞ)みどおり

translation.en: You're right.
Are you serious? We're bailing?
Yeah. We should be helping our team.
I'll take the Polaris back. Follow me, and you guys untie the net.
translation.ja: 車を返してくる 網を束ねて

translation.en: There. Fine. Take it apart.
I wanna help you take down Brody.
translation.ja: ブロディを倒(たお)そう

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! I just talked them out of it.
translation.ja: ダメだ 今 説得(せっとく)した

translation.en: Cleaning the outhouses.
Sounds like a Tower Two job to me.
What the...
Help me!
There's dog poo in my hair!
Things like this don't happen to Brody!
translation.ja: ブロディに こんな事ありえない

translation.en: - Whoa! - Help me!
Yes, it worked!
Uh, which is very bad.
Wait! No, Tyler! We didn't untie the net!
translation.ja: 待て タイラー ほどいてない

translation.en: Help!
What's going on?
Help me!
Oh, no!
Oh, I can see my tower from up here.
Ow, my boat key.
What did you guys do?
Nothing! I thought we agreed we weren't gonna pull the prank.
translation.ja: いたずらは やめた

translation.en: Why'd you make it so dangerous?
- That's what I said. - It was Lizzie's idea.
translation.ja: そうだよ リジーが

translation.en: - Which worked beautifully, by the way. - Enough!
translation.ja: 完璧(かんぺき)だった やめて

translation.en: You guys have been ignoring me all day, and that ends now!
translation.ja: 私を無視してたけど もうやめて

translation.en: I'm the captain.
You're gonna do what I say, how I say it, when I say it.
translation.ja: 私が言った時に 言った事をやって

translation.en: - You got a problem with that? - No.
translation.ja: 文句(もんく)ある？ いえ

translation.en: No what?
No, Captain!
Tyler, Gina, we need something in case he falls.
translation.ja: タイラー ジーナ 何かクッションを

translation.en: Lizzie, Eric, grab some rappelling gear and meet me at the Polaris.
translation.ja: リジー エリック 登山道具を

translation.en: Come on, guys, let's go!
Once I hook the net, pull him up with the winch.
Why is this happening? Help me! Help me!
translation.ja: どうなってる？ 助けてくれ！

translation.en: Help!
Ow!
Brody, calm down, we're gonna save you.
translation.ja: 助けるから落ち着いて

translation.en: You're running this rescue? Oh, great. I'm dead.
translation.ja: 君がやるの？ 俺は死ぬ

translation.en: - - Will you stop? I got this.
Please! Someone!
Anybody else!
Tower Two is the worst!
What are you doing?
You're gonna leave us alone for the rest of the summer.
translation.ja: 私たちの邪(じゃ)魔(ま)はやめて

translation.en: No, I'm not!
Whoa! Wait, wait, what are you doing? Are you crazy?
translation.ja: 何してる？ バカはよせ

translation.en: - Stop it! - I will.
translation.ja: バカはよせ いいわ

translation.en: If you stop giving us bad assignments. It has to be fair from now on.
translation.ja: イヤな任務ばかり やらせなければ

translation.en: But I want to ruin your summer.
- - Okay, fine, fine!
Fine! I'll stop, I'll stop. Just please...
Please get me out of here.
- - Get ready to pull him up!
Never mind!
I can't believe... we blew that up... by mouth.
translation.ja: よく膨(ふく)らませられたな 口だけで

translation.en: - Why isn't there a pump for this thing? - There is.
translation.ja: 空気入れは？ あるけど

translation.en: - - We just don't have... an extension cord.
translation.ja: 延長(えんちょう)コードがなかった

translation.en: She cut the rope! She's insane!
translation.ja: ロープを切った イカれてる

translation.en: She cut the rope!
Who does that?
- - Ow! I fell on my whistle.
Yo, Dylan, I can't believe you dropped him. That was hardcore.
translation.ja: アイツを落とすとは過激(かげき)だな

translation.en: You are crazy.
No, she's crazy.
translation.ja: 違(ちが)う　イカれてる

translation.en: Still don't hear it.
Come on.
That was a surprisingly baller move.
translation.ja: 大胆(だいたん)な救助ね

translation.en: Well, I'm a surprisingly baller lady.
translation.ja: 私って大胆な女なのよ

translation.en: Don't worry. I won't tell them it was an accident.
translation.ja: 真実は隠(かく)しておく

translation.en: Thanks. They're totally worshiping me right now.
translation.ja: ありがと　今 尊敬されてる

translation.en: Hey, Dylan.
You're right. You're our captain, and maybe...
translation.ja: 君が正しい リーダーの君の話を―

translation.en: there's kind of a possibility that... I should have listened to you today.
translation.ja: 聞くべきだったのかも しれない

translation.en: Is there anything you wanna say to me?
I agree. You should've listened to me.
translation.ja: 同感よ 聞くべきだった

translation.en: Come on, let's finish our assignments.
Uh, I'm not going near those swim fins. An octopus peed on me today.
translation.ja: 私はフィンはお断(ことわ)り タコにおしっこされた

translation.en: Please tell me you washed your hands.
I did not.
Hope you don't mind. I gotta make a quick stop at Adam Schwartzman's bar mitzvah before I take you guys home.
translation.ja: アダムの成人式に 先に行っていいかな

translation.en: I'm Adam.
Today I became a man.
Put that arm around me, and you won't be one for long.
Hey, guys.
Does anyone know where we're going? I'm not lost.
translation.ja: 今どこかな？ 迷ってない

translation.en: - But I might be. -
♪ I was gonna be that one in a million ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　藤井 幸子
